results.description: Levante goalkeeper Aitor Fernández is cleared to play in Sunday's game at Athletic Bilbao after being excused from working at a polling station on the day of the match.

results.title: Aitor Fernández: Levante keeper to play after being excused from election duty

results.description: La Liga leaders Barcelona concede three goals in seven second-half minutes as Levante come from behind to defeat Ernesto Valverde's champions.
results.shortTitle: Levante fight back to beat Barcelona
results.title: Levante 3-1 Barcelona: La Liga leaders fall to defeat at Levante

results.description: Levante host Barcelona in La Liga - follow live text commentary.

results.description: La Liga's bottom side Leganes appeal for their match against Levante to be replayed after claiming the video assistant referee system failed.

results.title: Leganes appeal to La Liga for Levante match to be replayed after VAR 'failure'

results.description: Eden Hazard makes his Real Madrid debut as Karim Benzema scores twice in a nervy win over Levante in La Liga.

results.description: French side Nantes take Nigeria winger Moses Simon on loan from Spanish club Levante.

results.description: France forward Antoine Griezmann is jeered by his own supporters as he played his final match for Atletico Madrid on Saturday.

results.title: Levante 2-2 Atletico Madrid: Antoine Griezmann jeered by Atletico supporters in final game

results.description: Lionel Messi comes on at half-time to score a decisive goal as Barcelona wrap up their 26th La Liga title against Levante.

results.title: Barcelona 1-0 Levante: Lionel Messi off the bench to secure La Liga title

results.description: Colombia midfielder Jefferson Lerma joins Bournemouth for a club record £25m fee from Spanish side Levante on a five-year deal.
